title: Readout of Vice President Mike Pence’s Meeting with Prime Minister Juha Sipila of Finland – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
November 28, 2018
Vice President Mike Pence met today with Prime Minister Juha Sipila of Finland. The Vice President reaffirmed the importance of our strong bilateral relationship, and both agreed on the importance of transatlantic and regional cooperation in facing global challenges.  The two exchanged views on a range of issues including regional security, the arctic and trade and investment issues and agreed to continued dialogue on these issues.
